headline: Jim Cramer Labels McKesson Corporation (MCK) a “Money Machine – A Must-Own Middleman”
summary: We recently published a list of Jim Cramer’s List of 16 Stocks to Buy Right Now. In this article, we are going to take a look at where McKesson Corporation (NYSE:MCK) stands against other stocks on Jim Cramer’s list to buy right now.
